I am one of those in the Kanto and might be persuaded to head to Heian-kyo 
for a few days.  I have quite a bit of writing to do during March so can't 
promise anything, but lemme know how plans progress.

-Shannon

From: "William&Mikiko Letham" <mickey.letham@...>

March 19 to the 26 you say. I have some days off from my school on 20-21 
and
25-31. However its a busy season with the new school year starting in 
April.
The best time for me might be Sunday the 21st. Getting to Kyoto is no
problem; its only a 30 minute train ride.

William
